Articles.Content:
> 
> Finally watched it. Was fun watching someone try it for the first time and completely winging it.
> But good lord, everything in moderation man. I lost count how many times you added effects to something, and how often you zoomed up on your face.

That's Pewdiepie. Many people here just got used to boring and plain, uneventful KSP gameplay.

I watch KSP (and some other game) streams to learn something about the game.

As soon as the host giggles at their own inability to find a gadget or perform an action I kill the stream and block the streamer.

Videos are more useful, since you can skip over the useless crud.
